name: Distributed Object Protocol
short_description:
Distributed Object Protocol is a extendable data format that could be used for most of the files format needs or as network communication protocol.

The project is a C++ 11 library which needs the new C++11 features to compile without errors and its only based on the standard C++ libraries.

Since Its a small library but effective one, I didn't includes any kind of make files, its only headers and sources.( Simply I do not want to restrict you to any build system like cmake if there is no need for it ).

So enjoy the flexibility of this protocol, and let me know what you think its missing !

Have a nice coding :) !
summary: An extendable data format and communication protocol C++11+ Library
